description:
This work element will analyze adult detection data for the purpose of  generating accurate spawner escapement estimates for each Yakima MPG steelhead population. Specifically the work element will generate population specific adult escapement and spawner escapement estimates using PIT-tag detections from strategically placed Remote Inriver detection systems.

 Population estimates are provided for Satus Creek, Toppenish Creek, the Naches River and Upper Yakima River Steelhead populations
